title: Approaches to estimating probability
body: An elementary school principal is reviewing literacy intervention outcomes. Last year, $$150$$ students participated in a reading support program. By the end of the year, $$105$$ of those students met grade-level reading benchmarks. The principal calculates the proportion of successful outcomes to estimate the likelihood that a future participant will meet proficiency after receiving the intervention. She plans to present this estimate when requesting funding for program expansion.\n
courseName: EEPL614 Quantitative Methods for Educational Leadership
